bug.question: I have six legs and like to crawl. I make honey. Who am I?
I hop and jump, and I'm green. Sometimes I eat plants in a bean field. What am I?

hints.text: 🐸 I'm not a frog, but I jump like one!

bug.question: I have spots and I am red. Gardeners like me. What am I?
I march in a line, and I am very strong. I can carry things much bigger than me all day long. What am I?
I have beautiful wings, and I fly around flowers. I used to be a caterpillar. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I eat a lot when I am young.
🌈 I have many colors on my wings.

bug.question: I spin a web, but I'm not a computer. I have eight legs. Who am I?

hints.text: 🕷️ Some people are scared of me.

bug.question: I buzz around your head and sometimes bite. I drink blood. Who am I?

hints.text: 🚫 Use bug spray to keep me away!
🌃 I am often out at dusk.

bug.question: I dig in the ground and eat plant roots. I am white and wiggly. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I will grow into a beetle eventually.

bug.question: I fly at night and am attracted to light. People often confuse me with butterflies. What am I?

hints.text: 🦋 My wings are usually duller in color.

bug.question: I shed my skin as I grow, and some people keep me as a pet. I eat leaves. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I am known as a walking stick.

transport.question: I have wheels and go on the road. Sometimes I am red or blue. What am I?

hints.text: 🚗 I can take you to the park.
👪 You ride in me with your family.

transport.question: I’m big and yellow and take kids to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🎒 I pick up kids every morning.

transport.question: I float on the water, and sometimes I have sails. What am I?

hints.text: ⛵ I can go on the ocean.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and have wings, taking people far away. What am I?

hints.text: 🌎 I can take you to another country.

transport.question: I go on tracks and carry many passengers. Choo choo!

hints.text: 📣 I make a loud noise when I arrive.

transport.question: I have two wheels, and you push pedals to make me go. What am I?

hints.text: 🦵 You use your legs to make me move.
🧑‍⚕️ You can wear a helmet when you ride me.
🍃 I don't need any fuel to run.

transport.question: I help put out fires with water and a loud siren. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I go to places where there is danger.
🚨 I have a very loud siren.

transport.question: I zoom through space and take astronauts to the moon. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I need lots of fuel to fly.

transport.question: I carry lots of things, sometimes in boxes, and I'm bigger than a car. What am I?

hints.text: 📦 I transport items from one place to another.
🚚 I am bigger than a car but smaller than a train.
🛣️ I drive on the roads for long distances.

transport.question: I fly close to the ground, I have spinning blades on top and can land almost anywhere. What am I?

hints.text: ⚕️ I can be used to rescue people.
📍 I can hover in one spot.
